This Weekly Survey Module report contains metrics related to Connect survey completion including baseline surveys and follow up surveys. Additional metrics will be added as new surveys are released. Metrics related to the baseline biospecimen surveys, menstrual cycle survey, and COVID survey can be found in the Weekly Biospecimen Metrics reports. Metrics related to overall baseline study activity completion, including baseline survey completion, can be found in the Weekly Operations Report. The Survey Module report is run on a weekly basis and encompasses data through today at 9:30 am. This data is extracted from the flattened participants table. This report is restricted to verified participants with a recruitment status of either active or passive.


\textbf{\textcolor{blue}{Do not share any data from this report that indicate the number of individuals at any of the Connect recruitment sites with individuals outside of the Connect Study.  This includes in manuscripts, abstracts, presentations, etc. You may present data aggregated across all of the Connect sites.}}.

```{r Functions, include=FALSE}


### Regular tbl_cross

create_tbl_cross1 <- function(data,row_var, colm_var, row_or_col_pct, row_name, column_name){
cross__table <- data %>%  
  tbl_cross(
    row = !!sym(row_var),
    col = !!sym(colm_var),
    digits=c(0,2),
    percent = row_or_col_pct,
    label=list(!!sym(row_var) ~ row_name,
               !!sym(colm_var) ~ column_name),
    missing="ifany",
    margin_text="Total") 

#Ops doesn't like the grouped by variables on a different line the column labels
cross_table_df <- as.data.frame(cross__table)[-1, ]
  
}





### a tbl cross where the output should have all row percentages, but the Total column should be a column percentage

create_tbl_cross2 <- function(data, row_var, colm_var, row_or_col_pct, row_name, column_name, margin_text) {
  cross__table <- data %>%
    tbl_cross(
      row = !!sym(row_var),
      col = !!sym(colm_var),
      label = list(!!sym(row_var) ~ row_name,
                   !!sym(colm_var) ~ column_name),
      percent = row_or_col_pct,
      digits = c(0, 2),
      margin_text = margin_text
    )
  
  # Check if table_body exists and has data
  if (!is.null(cross__table[["table_body"]]) && nrow(cross__table[["table_body"]]) > 0) {
    # Need only the total column to be a column percentage
    cross__table[["table_body"]]$stat_0 <- sapply(strsplit(cross__table[["table_body"]]$stat_0, " "), "[", 1)
    
    cross__table_df <- as.data.frame(cross__table)[2:nrow(as.data.frame(cross__table)), ]
    colnames(cross__table_df)[1] <- row_name
    
    # Ensure 'Total Verified Participants' exists before modifying
    if ("Total Verified Participants" %in% colnames(cross__table_df)) {
      cross__table_df$`Total Verified Participants` <- as.numeric(gsub(",", "", cross__table_df$`Total Verified Participants`))
      
      total_participants <- cross__table_df$`Total Verified Participants`
      percentages <- round((total_participants / total_participants[length(total_participants)]) * 100, digits = 2)
      
      cross__table_df$`Total Verified Participants` <- paste0(format(total_participants, big.mark = ","), " (", percentages, "%)")
    }
    
    colnames(cross__table_df)[ncol(cross__table_df)] <- "Total Verified \n Participants"
    return(cross__table_df)
  } else {
    warning("The cross table is empty or missing table_body.")
    return(data.frame()) # Return an empty data frame if table_body is missing
  }
}
```

# Baseline Survey

The Baseline Survey is available to Active recruits who enrolled with a valid token/PIN at time of user profile submission. The survey is available to passive recruits and active recruits who enrolled without a valid token/PIN at time of verification.

Starting July 5th, 2022, all four Initial Survey Modules were in MyConnect. In order of how the sections appear on MyConnect, the Initial Survey Sections are:  

BOH= Background and Overall Health (Module 1); available in MyConnect at time of study launch on 07/21/2021.  

LAW= Where you Live and Work (Module 4); available in MyConnect starting 07/05/2022 and at which point all 4 sections of the Baseline Survey became available to participants.

MRE= Medications, Reproductive Health, Exercise, and Sleep (Module 2); available in MyConnect starting 06/10/2022.

SAS= Smoking, Alcohol, and Sun Exposure (Module 3); available in MyConnect starting 06/10/2022.

```{r Table3, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

## Each of these rows are essentially their own table
## Keep row percentage but make into one table

## Baseline Survey Status Counts
calculate_counts <- function(df, column_name, row_label) {
  total_rows <- dim(df)[[1]]
  value_counts <- sapply(c(972455046, 615768760, 231311385), function(value) {
    count <- sum(df[[column_name]] == value)
    formatted_count <- formatC(count, format = "f", big.mark = ",", digits = 0)
    percentage <- round(100 * count / total_rows, 2)
    paste0(formatted_count, " (", percentage, "%)")
  })
  total_label <- paste(formatC(total_rows, format = "f", big.mark = ",", digits = 0), "(100.00%)")
  c(row_label, value_counts, total_label)
}


section_comp <- data.frame(matrix(ncol =5, nrow = 4))


section_comp[1, ] <- calculate_counts(all_data, "d_949302066", "BOH")
section_comp[2, ] <- calculate_counts(all_data, "d_536735468", "MRE")
section_comp[3, ] <- calculate_counts(all_data, "d_976570371", "SAS")
section_comp[4, ] <- calculate_counts(all_data, "d_663265240", "LAW")


colnames(section_comp) <- c("Section", "Not Started", "Started", "Submitted", "Total Verified Participants")
```

```{r Submission_Minutes,echo=FALSE, error=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}



completing_module <- function(data, start_time, end_time, completion_flag, completion_status, module_name) {
  
  
  data <- data %>%
    filter(!!sym(completion_flag) == completion_status)
  
  
  comp_tm <- as.numeric(difftime(as.POSIXct(ymd_hms(data[[start_time]])), 
                                 as.POSIXct(ymd_hms(data[[end_time]])), 
                                 units = "hours"))
  
  
  data <- data %>%
    mutate(comp_mins = comp_tm * 60,
           time_frame = case_when(comp_mins < 5 ~ "Under 5 minutes",
                                  comp_mins < 10 ~ "5 to 10 minutes",
                                  comp_mins < 15 ~ "10 to 15 minutes",
                                  comp_mins < 20 ~ "15 to 20 minutes",
                                  comp_mins < 30 ~ "20 to 30 minutes",
                                  comp_mins < 45 ~ "30 to 45 minutes",
                                  comp_mins < 60 ~ "45 to 60 minutes",
                                  comp_mins >= 60 ~ "60 minutes+",
                                  is.na(data[[start_time]]) | is.na(data[[end_time]]) ~ "Missing Time Stamp(s)",
                                  start_time>end_time ~ "Start Time after End Time")) #new
  
  data$time_frame <- factor(data$time_frame, levels = c(
    "Under 5 minutes", "5 to 10 minutes", "10 to 15 minutes",
    "15 to 20 minutes", "20 to 30 minutes", "30 to 45 minutes",
    "45 to 60 minutes", "60 minutes+", "Missing Time Stamp(s)",
    "Start Time after End Time"
  ))
  
  #Add a Total Row
  summary_data <- data %>%
    group_by(time_frame) %>%
    summarize(n = n(), percentage = 100 * n / nrow(data)) %>%
    ungroup() %>%
    mutate(cumulative_percentage = cumsum(percentage)) %>%
    select(time_frame, n, percentage, cumulative_percentage)
  
  summary_row <- summary_data %>%
    summarize(n = sum(n), percentage = 100, 
              cumulative_percentage = 100,
              time_frame = "Total")
  
  summary_data <- bind_rows(summary_data, summary_row)
  
  table_summary <- summary_data %>%
    mutate(np = paste0(n, " (", round(percentage, digits = 2), "%)"),
           cumulative_percentage = paste0(round(cumulative_percentage, digits = 2), "%")) %>%
    select(time_frame, np, cumulative_percentage)
  
  knitr::kable(table_summary, 
               caption = paste0('Table ', module_name, ' Section Initial Survey Submission Time \n from Start to Submit for Verified Participants'), 
               col.names = c("Submission Time", "Total Participants", "Cumulative Percentage"), 
               row.names = FALSE, align = c("l", "c"), digits = 1, booktabs = TRUE) %>%  
    add_indent(seq(1, nrow(table_summary) - 1)) %>% 
    kable_styling(latex_options = "scale_down") 
}


table6.1_sum <- completing_module(all_data, "d_517311251", "d_205553981", "d_949302066", 231311385, "1.6.a. BOH")
table6.2_sum <- completing_module(all_data, "d_832139544", "d_541836531", "d_536735468", 231311385, "1.6.b. MRE")
table6.3_sum <- completing_module(all_data, "d_770257102", "d_386488297", "d_976570371", 231311385, "1.6.c. SAS")
```

# SSN Survey
The SSN Baseline Survey was available at time of baseline study launch on 07/21/2021. All verified participants that are not withdrawn are eligible for the survey. Participants can provide either their full (9-digits) or partial (4-digits) SSN in the survey. If a participant chooses to not provide their SSN the survey will still remain on their To Do List in MyConnect until SSN is provided.

```{r merge1, include=FALSE, warning=FALSE}


### Pulling in Module 1 completion to get participant defined race for the next few tables



recr_M1 <- bq_project_query(project, query="SELECT token,Connect_ID, d_821247024, d_914594314,  d_827220437,d_512820379, d_255077064,
                            d_949302066 , d_517311251  FROM  `nih-nci-dceg-connect-prod-6d04.FlatConnect.participants` WHERE  d_821247024='197316935' and (d_512820379='486306141' OR d_512820379='854703046')")
recr_m1 <- bq_table_download(recr_M1,bigint = "integer64",n_max = Inf, page_size = 10000)
cnames <- names(recr_m1)
# Check that it doesn't match any non-number
numbers_only <- function(x) !grepl("\\D", x)
# to check variables in recr_noinact_wl1
for (i in 1: length(cnames)){
  varname <- cnames[i]
  var<-pull(recr_m1,varname)
  recr_m1[,cnames[i]] <- ifelse(numbers_only(var), as.numeric(as.character(var)), var)
}


####### Handling participants that somehow completed both Mod1 version 1 and Mod1 version 2

sql_M1_1 <- bq_project_query(project, query="SELECT Connect_ID, D_384191091_D_384191091_D_583826374, D_384191091_D_384191091_D_636411467, 
                             D_384191091_D_384191091_D_458435048, D_384191091_D_384191091_D_706998638, D_384191091_D_384191091_D_973565052, 
                             D_384191091_D_384191091_D_586825330, D_384191091_D_384191091_D_412790539, D_384191091_D_384191091_D_807835037,
                             D_384191091_D_747350323,D_384191091_D_384191091_D_746038746, d_784119588
                             FROM `nih-nci-dceg-connect-prod-6d04.FlatConnect.module1_v1` where Connect_ID is not null")
sql_M1_2 <- bq_project_query(project, query="SELECT Connect_ID, D_384191091_D_384191091_D_583826374 ,D_384191091_D_384191091_D_636411467, 
                             D_384191091_D_384191091_D_458435048, D_384191091_D_384191091_D_706998638, D_384191091_D_384191091_D_973565052,
                             D_384191091_D_384191091_D_586825330,D_384191091_D_384191091_D_412790539,D_384191091_D_384191091_D_807835037,
                             D_384191091_D_747350323,D_384191091_D_384191091_D_746038746, d_784119588
                             FROM `nih-nci-dceg-connect-prod-6d04.FlatConnect.module1_v2` where Connect_ID is not null")


M1_V1 <- bq_table_download(sql_M1_1, bigint = "integer64")
M1_V2 <- bq_table_download(sql_M1_2, bigint = "integer64")

# Select matching column names
M1_V1_vars <- colnames(M1_V1)
M1_V2_vars <- colnames(M1_V2)
common_vars <- intersect(M1_V1_vars, M1_V2_vars)

# Subset to common columns
M1_V1_common <- M1_V1[, common_vars]
M1_V2_common <- M1_V2[, common_vars]

# Add version indicator
M1_V1_common$version <- 1
M1_V2_common$version <- 2

# Identify columns with mismatched types
mismatched_cols <- names(M1_V1_common)[sapply(names(M1_V1_common), function(col) {
  class(M1_V1_common[[col]]) != class(M1_V2_common[[col]])
})]

# Convert mismatched columns to character for consistency
M1_V1_common <- M1_V1_common %>%
  mutate(across(all_of(mismatched_cols), as.character))
M1_V2_common <- M1_V2_common %>%
  mutate(across(all_of(mismatched_cols), as.character))

# Combine both versions for participants who completed both
M1_common <- bind_rows(M1_V1_common, M1_V2_common) %>%
  arrange(Connect_ID, desc(version))

# For columns unique to each version
V1_only_vars <- setdiff(M1_V1_vars, common_vars)
V2_only_vars <- setdiff(M1_V2_vars, common_vars)

# Subset each version for unique columns and add version indicator
m1_v1_only <- M1_V1[, c("Connect_ID", V1_only_vars)] %>%
  mutate(version = 1)
m1_v2_only <- M1_V2[, c("Connect_ID", V2_only_vars)] %>%
  mutate(version = 2)

# Combine the unique and common data
m1_common_v1 <- left_join(M1_common, m1_v1_only, by = c("Connect_ID", "version"))
m1_combined_v1v2 <- left_join(m1_common_v1, m1_v2_only, by = c("Connect_ID", "version"))

# Filter for complete cases where specific completion criteria are met
m1_complete <- m1_combined_v1v2 %>%
  filter(Connect_ID %in% recr_m1$Connect_ID[recr_m1$d_949302066 == 231311385]) %>%
  arrange(desc(version))

# Remove duplicates, keeping only the most recent version for each Connect_ID
m1_complete_nodup <- m1_complete[!duplicated(m1_complete$Connect_ID),]

m1_complete_nodup$Connect_ID <- as.numeric(m1_complete_nodup$Connect_ID)



all_data$Connect_ID <- as.numeric(all_data$Connect_ID)


m1_comp_df= left_join(m1_complete_nodup, all_data, by="Connect_ID")
dim(m1_comp_df)


m1_comp <- as_tibble(m1_comp_df)


knitr::opts_chunk$set(comment = NA)

```

```{r Table14, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
## Time from QOL trigger to submission of QOL survey
# category= 3mo QOL Survey Reminders attempt=1st contact notification_time will be used in place of FIRST_QOL_REMINDER

trig_qol <- bq_project_query(project,
query="SELECT distinct(token), notification_time FROM `nih-nci-dceg-connect-prod-6d04.FlatConnect.notifications`
where category='3mo QOL Survey Reminders' and attempt='1st contact'")
trigger <- bigrquery::bq_table_download(trig_qol,bigint = "integer64")


trigger_time <- left_join(all_data, trigger, by="token")


## Those verified before 12/1/2023 were notified in batches that there's a new survey. New participants become eligible after 90 days  
trigger_time <- trigger_time %>%
  mutate(trig = case_when(d_914594314 <= as.Date("2023-12-01") ~ ymd_hms(notification_time),
                          TRUE ~ ymd_hms(d_914594314) + days(90)))

trig_time<- trigger_time %>%  filter(qolcomplt=="Submitted") %>%
  mutate(trigTM_qol = as.numeric(difftime(as.POSIXct(ymd_hms(d_843688458)), as.POSIXct(ymd_hms(trig)), units="days")))

Trig_table = trig_time %>%
  dplyr::summarize('N'=n(),
                   Min = round(min(trigTM_qol, na.rm = TRUE), digits=2),
```

```{r BL_PROMIS_timeframe, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
         MRE = as.Date(d_843688458) <= as.Date(d_832139544) & difftime( as.Date(d_832139544), as.Date(d_843688458), units="days") <31,
         SAS = as.Date(d_843688458) <= as.Date(d_770257102) & difftime( as.Date(d_770257102), as.Date(d_843688458), units="days") <31,
         LAW = as.Date(d_843688458) <= as.Date(d_264644252) & difftime( as.Date(d_264644252), as.Date(d_843688458), units="days") <31,
         BUM = (as.Date(BUM_time) < as.Date(trig) ) & (as.Date(d_843688458) <= as.Date(d_222161762)) & difftime( as.Date(d_222161762), as.Date(d_843688458), units="days") <31,  
         BU = (as.Date(BU_time) < as.Date(trig) ) & (as.Date(d_843688458) <= as.Date(d_764863765)) & difftime( as.Date(d_764863765), as.Date(d_843688458), units="days") <31,
         MW = (as.Date(d_173836415_d_266600170_d_319972665_d_661940160) < as.Date(trig)) & 
           (as.Date(d_843688458) <= as.Date(d_195145666)) & difftime( as.Date(d_195145666), as.Date(d_843688458), units="days") <31,
         COVID = (as.Date(d_556788178) < as.Date(trig)) & (as.Date(d_556788178) >= as.Date("2023-07-05")) & 
           (as.Date(d_843688458) <= as.Date(d_784810139)) & difftime( as.Date(d_784810139),as.Date(d_843688458),units="days") <31) %>%

          MRE = !is.na(d_517311251) & (is.na(d_832139544) | as.Date(trig) <= as.Date(d_832139544)),
          SAS = !is.na(d_517311251) & (is.na(d_770257102) | as.Date(trig) <= as.Date(d_770257102)),
          LAW = !is.na(d_517311251) & (is.na(d_264644252) | as.Date(trig) <= as.Date(d_264644252)),
          BUM = (as.Date(BUM_time) < as.Date(trig))  & (is.na(d_222161762) | as.Date(trig) <= as.Date(d_222161762)),
          BU = (as.Date(BU_time) < as.Date(trig))  & (is.na(d_764863765) | as.Date(trig) <= as.Date(d_764863765)),
          MW = (as.Date(d_173836415_d_266600170_d_319972665_d_661940160) < as.Date(trig)) &
            (is.na(d_195145666) | as.Date(trig) <= as.Date(d_195145666)),
          COVID = as.Date(d_556788178) < as.Date(trig) &
            as.Date(d_556788178) >= as.Date("2023-07-05") &
            (is.na(d_784810139) | as.Date(trig) <= as.Date(d_784810139))) %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = c(BOH, MRE, SAS, LAW, BUM, BU, MW, COVID),
    names_to = "qol_timeframe",

  ) %>%
```

```{r CSH_trig_stop, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

## Time from CSH trigger to submission of CSH survey

trig_csh <- bq_project_query(project,
                             query="SELECT distinct(Connect_ID), notification_time as CSH_notif FROM `nih-nci-dceg-connect-prod-6d04.FlatConnect.notifications` notif
                             left join `nih-nci-dceg-connect-prod-6d04.FlatConnect.participants` pts
                             on notif.token=pts.token
                             where category LIKE '%Screen%' and attempt='1st contact'")


trigger_csh <- bigrquery::bq_table_download(trig_csh,bigint = "integer64")


trigger_time$Connect_ID <- as.numeric(trigger_time$Connect_ID)
trigger_csh$Connect_ID <- as.numeric(trigger_csh$Connect_ID)

trigger_time <- left_join(trigger_time, trigger_csh, by="Connect_ID")


CSH_notif_table = trigger_time %>%  
  filter(CSH_status == "Submitted") %>%
  mutate(time = as.numeric(difftime(as.POSIXct(ymd_hms(d_389890053)), as.POSIXct(ymd_hms(CSH_notif)), units="days"))) %>% 
  dplyr::summarize('N'=n(),
                   Min = round(min(time, na.rm = TRUE), digits=2),
                   Q1 = round(quantile(time, 0.25, na.rm = TRUE), digits=2),
                   Median = round(median(time, na.rm = TRUE), digits=2),
                   Mean = round(mean(time, na.rm = TRUE),  digits=2),
                   SD= round(sd(time, na.rm = TRUE), digits=2),
                   Q3 = round(quantile(time, 0.75, na.rm = TRUE), digits=2),
                   'Perc.90' = round(quantile(time, 0.90, na.rm = TRUE), digits=2),
                   Max = round(max(time, na.rm = TRUE), digits=2))



knitr::kable(CSH_notif_table, 
             caption = 'Table 6.4. 9-Month Cancer Screening History Survey Completion from Trigger \n to Submit for Verified Participants, in Days', 
             row.names=FALSE, format.args = list(big.mark = ","), linesep = "", 
             booktabs = T, align=c("l", "c", "c", "c", "c", "c", "c", "c", "c")) %>% 
  kable_styling(latex_options = c("scale_down","hold_position"))
```

```{r BL_After_CSH2, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

## Determine when a person was CSH eligible
# time notification was sent

################   Numerator  ##############

#Completed CSH before or on the same day as BL survey--now within 30 days
BL_CSH <- trigger_time %>%
  filter(CSH_status == "Submitted") %>%
  mutate(BOH = as.Date(d_389890053) <= as.Date(d_517311251) & difftime(as.Date(d_517311251), as.Date(d_389890053), units="days") <31,
         MRE = as.Date(d_389890053) <= as.Date(d_832139544) & difftime(as.Date(d_832139544), as.Date(d_389890053), units="days") <31,
         SAS = as.Date(d_389890053) <= as.Date(d_770257102) & difftime(as.Date(d_770257102), as.Date(d_389890053), units="days") <31,
         LAW = as.Date(d_389890053) <= as.Date(d_264644252) & difftime(as.Date(d_264644252), as.Date(d_389890053), units="days") <31,
         BUM = (as.Date(BUM_time) < as.Date(CSH_notif) ) & (as.Date(d_389890053) <= as.Date(d_222161762)) & difftime(as.Date(d_222161762), as.Date(d_389890053), units="days") <31,  
         BU = (as.Date(BU_time) < as.Date(CSH_notif) ) & (as.Date(d_389890053) <= as.Date(d_764863765)) & difftime(as.Date(d_764863765), as.Date(d_389890053), units="days") <31, 
         MW = (as.Date(d_173836415_d_266600170_d_319972665_d_661940160) < as.Date(CSH_notif)) & (as.Date(d_389890053) <= as.Date(d_195145666)) & 
           difftime(as.Date(d_195145666), as.Date(d_389890053), units="days") <31,
         COVID = (as.Date(d_556788178) < as.Date(CSH_notif)) & (as.Date(d_556788178) >= as.Date("2023-07-05")) & (as.Date(d_389890053) <= as.Date(d_784810139)) & 
           difftime(as.Date(d_784810139),as.Date(d_389890053),units="days") <31) %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = c(BOH, MRE, SAS, LAW, BUM, BU, MW, COVID),
    names_to = "CSH_timeframe",
    values_to = "is_in_timeframe"
  ) %>%
  filter(is_in_timeframe) %>%  # Keep only TRUE rows
  group_by(CSH_timeframe) %>%
  tally()


#############    Denominator #################



## Determine when a participant was BL survey eligible
#MRE/SAS/LAW- once BOH completed ----   d_517311251
#BUM/BU- when notified by email 
#MW- when notified the MW kit was shipped
#COVID- pushed to prod on 7/5/2023 and requires biospecimen donation 





## Those that are eligible for CSH, and eligible for whichever BL module, who hadn't completed that BL module upon CSH eligibility activation
BL_time_eligible2 <- trigger_time %>%
  filter(!is.na(CSH_status) & CSH_status != "Not Eligible") %>%
  mutate( BOH = is.na(d_517311251) | (as.Date(CSH_notif) <= as.Date(d_517311251)),
          MRE = !is.na(d_517311251) & (is.na(d_832139544) | as.Date(CSH_notif) <= as.Date(d_832139544)),
          SAS = !is.na(d_517311251) & (is.na(d_770257102) | as.Date(CSH_notif) <= as.Date(d_770257102)),
          LAW = !is.na(d_517311251) & (is.na(d_264644252) | as.Date(CSH_notif) <= as.Date(d_264644252)),
          BUM = (as.Date(BUM_time) < as.Date(CSH_notif))  & (is.na(d_222161762) | as.Date(CSH_notif) <= as.Date(d_222161762)),
          BU = (as.Date(BU_time) < as.Date(CSH_notif))  & (is.na(d_764863765) | as.Date(CSH_notif) <= as.Date(d_764863765)),
          MW = (as.Date(d_173836415_d_266600170_d_319972665_d_661940160) < as.Date(CSH_notif)) &
            (is.na(d_195145666) | as.Date(CSH_notif) <= as.Date(d_195145666)),
          COVID = as.Date(d_556788178) < as.Date(CSH_notif) &
            as.Date(d_556788178) >= as.Date("2023-07-05") &
            (is.na(d_784810139) | as.Date(CSH_notif) <= as.Date(d_784810139))) %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = c(BOH, MRE, SAS, LAW, BUM, BU, MW, COVID),
    names_to = "CSH_notifframe",
    values_to = "is_in_timeframe"
  ) %>%
  filter(is_in_timeframe) %>%  # Keep only rows where the condition is TRUE
  group_by(CSH_notifframe) %>%
  tally()



###############################################################################

after_CSH <- cbind(BL_CSH, BL_time_eligible2)
after_CSH <- after_CSH[c(1,6,8,5,3,2,7,4), c(1,2,4)] # row order BOH, MRE, SAS, LAW, BUM, BU, MW, COVID, and remove repeated column
colnames(after_CSH) <- c("Survey", "n", "eligible")

after_CSH_table <- after_CSH %>%
  mutate(Percentage = (n / eligible) * 100,
         N_percent = paste0(formatC(n, big.mark = ",", format = "d"), 
                            " (", round(Percentage, digits = 2), "%)")) %>% 
  dplyr::rename('Eligible for Survey' = eligible,
         'N%' = N_percent) %>% 
    select('Survey', 'N%', 'Eligible for Survey')


knitr::kable(after_CSH_table,
             caption = 'Table 6.5. Baseline Survey Completion Within 30 days of \n Month Cancer Screening History Survey Survey Completion', 
             booktabs=T, linesep = "", row.names=FALSE, align=c("l", "c", "c")) %>% 
  kable_styling(latex_options = "scale_down") %>% 
  footnote(general = "Note: Percentages calculated among those who were eligible but had not yet completed the survey at the time of CSH invitation.", 
           general_title = "",
         footnote_as_chunk = TRUE, 
         escape = FALSE, 
         threeparttable = TRUE)
```

```{r BL_After_CES2, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}


################   Numerator  ##############

#Completed CES before or on the same day as BL survey-- now within 30 days
BL_CES <- trigger_time %>%
  filter(CES_status == "Submitted") %>%
  mutate(BOH = as.Date(d_199471989) <= as.Date(d_517311251) & difftime(as.Date(d_517311251), as.Date(d_199471989), units="days") <31,
         MRE = as.Date(d_199471989) <= as.Date(d_832139544) & difftime(as.Date(d_832139544), as.Date(d_199471989), units="days") <31,
         SAS = as.Date(d_199471989) <= as.Date(d_770257102) & difftime(as.Date(d_770257102), as.Date(d_199471989), units="days") <31,
         LAW = as.Date(d_199471989) <= as.Date(d_264644252) & difftime(as.Date(d_264644252), as.Date(d_199471989), units="days") <31,
         BUM = (as.Date(BUM_time) < as.Date("2024-09-30") ) & (as.Date(d_199471989) <= as.Date(d_222161762)) & difftime(as.Date(d_222161762), as.Date(d_199471989), units="days") <31,  
         BU = (as.Date(BU_time) < as.Date("2024-09-30")  ) & (as.Date(d_199471989) <= as.Date(d_764863765)) & difftime(as.Date(d_764863765), as.Date(d_199471989), units="days") <31, 
         MW = (as.Date(d_173836415_d_266600170_d_319972665_d_661940160) < as.Date("2024-09-30") ) & (as.Date(d_199471989) <= as.Date(d_195145666))  & 
           difftime(as.Date(d_195145666), as.Date(d_199471989), units="days") <31,
         COVID = (as.Date(d_556788178) < as.Date("2024-09-30") ) & (as.Date(d_556788178) >= as.Date("2023-07-05")) & (as.Date(d_199471989) <= as.Date(d_784810139)) & 
           difftime(as.Date(d_784810139),as.Date(d_199471989),units="days") <31) %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = c(BOH, MRE, SAS, LAW, BUM, BU, MW, COVID),
    names_to = "CES_timeframe",
    values_to = "is_in_timeframe"
  ) %>%
  filter(is_in_timeframe) %>%  # Keep only TRUE rows
  group_by(CES_timeframe) %>%
  tally()


#############    Denominator #################

## Determine when a person was CES eligible
# All participants with a survey status NOT 'Not Eligible' or null; notificaton for CES was sent on 9/30/24


## Determine when a participant was BL survey eligible
#MRE/SAS/LAW- once BOH completed ----   d_517311251
#BUM/BU- when notified by email 
#MW- when notified the MW kit was shipped
#COVID- pushed to prod on 7/5/2023 and requires biospecimen donation 





## of those that are eligible for CES, and eligible for whichever BL module, who hadn't completed that module upon eligibility activation
BL_time_eligible3 <- trigger_time %>%
  filter(!is.na(CES_status) & CES_status != "Not Eligible") %>%
  mutate( BOH = is.na(d_517311251) | (as.Date("2024-09-30")  <= as.Date(d_517311251)),
          MRE = !is.na(d_517311251) & (is.na(d_832139544) | as.Date("2024-09-30")  <= as.Date(d_832139544)),
          SAS = !is.na(d_517311251) & (is.na(d_770257102) | as.Date("2024-09-30")  <= as.Date(d_770257102)),
          LAW = !is.na(d_517311251) & (is.na(d_264644252) | as.Date("2024-09-30")  <= as.Date(d_264644252)),
          BUM = (as.Date(BUM_time) < as.Date("2024-09-30") )  & (is.na(d_222161762) | as.Date("2024-09-30")  <= as.Date(d_222161762)),
          BU = (as.Date(BU_time) < as.Date("2024-09-30") )  & (is.na(d_764863765) | as.Date("2024-09-30")  <= as.Date(d_764863765)),
          MW = (as.Date(d_173836415_d_266600170_d_319972665_d_661940160) < as.Date("2024-09-30") ) &
            (is.na(d_195145666) | as.Date("2024-09-30")  <= as.Date(d_195145666)),
          COVID = as.Date(d_556788178) < as.Date("2024-09-30")  &
            as.Date(d_556788178) >= as.Date("2023-07-05") &
            (is.na(d_784810139) | as.Date("2024-09-30")  <= as.Date(d_784810139))) %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = c(BOH, MRE, SAS, LAW, BUM, BU, MW, COVID),
    names_to = "CES_timeframe",
    values_to = "is_in_timeframe"
  ) %>%
  filter(is_in_timeframe) %>%  # Keep only rows where the condition is TRUE
  group_by(CES_timeframe) %>%
  tally()



###############################################################################

after_CES <- cbind(BL_CES, BL_time_eligible3)
after_CES <- after_CES[c(1,6,8,5,3,2,7,4), c(1,2,4)] # row order BOH, MRE, SAS, LAW, BUM, BU, MW, COVID, and remove repeated column
colnames(after_CES) <- c("Survey", "n", "eligible")

after_CES_table <- after_CES %>%
  mutate(Percentage = (n / eligible) * 100,
         N_percent = paste0(formatC(n, big.mark = ",", format = "d"),

         'N%' = N_percent) %>% 
    select('Survey', 'N%', 'Eligible for Survey')


knitr::kable(after_CES_table,
```

```{r Svy_Lang_Diff, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, results='asis'}
#must match the order for survey_acronyms in the chunk below
survey_dfs <- list(m1_lang, m2_lang, m3_lang, m4_lang, BUM_lang, BU_lang, CV_lang, Mens_lang, MW_lang, QOL_lang, DHQ_lang, CSH_lang, CES_lang) 

# Initialize an empty data frame to store results for all participants
all_scenarios <- data.frame(Connect_ID = character(), Flag = character(), Pref_lang = character(), stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

# Loop through each survey data frame
for (current_df in survey_dfs) {
  current_df <- current_df %>%
    mutate(
      Flag = ifelse(is.na(language), NA, 
                    ifelse(language == 773342525, "Spanish", "English")), 
      Pref_lang = case_when(d_255077064 == 773342525 ~ "Spanish", TRUE ~ "English")
    )
  
  # Extract relevant columns and add to the scenario tracking data frame
  participant_scenarios <- current_df %>%
    select(Connect_ID, Flag, Pref_lang)
  
  all_scenarios <- bind_rows(all_scenarios, participant_scenarios)
}

# Summarize the scenario for each participant
final_scenarios <- all_scenarios %>%
  group_by(Connect_ID) %>%
  summarize(
    Flag_set = unique(na.omit(Flag)), # Remove NAs from Flags
    Pref_lang_set = unique(Pref_lang),
    scenario = case_when(
      length(Flag_set) == 0 ~ "No survey language preference has been made", 
      all(Flag_set == Pref_lang_set) ~ "Survey Flags and Preferred Language Consistent",
      any(Flag_set != Pref_lang_set) ~ "Any Survey Flag Inconsistent with Preferred Language"
    )
  ) %>%
  ungroup()

# Summarize the counts for each scenario
scenario_counts <- final_scenarios %>%
  count(scenario) %>%
  dplyr::rename(Scenario = scenario, 'Total Participants' = n)

consist <- knitr::kable(scenario_counts,
                        caption = "Table 8.2. Consistency of Language Choice in Survey Completion",
                        row.names = FALSE, align = c("l", "c"), digits = 2, booktabs = TRUE) %>%
  kable_styling(latex_options = "scale_down") %>% 
  footnote(general="Those who do not start any surveys will not have survey flags, and thus not be counted in this table. Those that start but do not complete a survey will still choose a survey language.", 
           general_title = "Note: ", 
           footnote_as_chunk = T)
```

```{r Svy_Lang_Compare, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, results='asis'}

# must match the order for survey_dfs in the chunk above
survey_acronyms <- c("BOH", "MRE", "SAS", "LAW", "BUM", "BU", "COVID", "MENS", "MW", "QOL", "DHQ", "CSH",  "CES") 


create_table <- function(current_df, current_acronym) {
  if (nrow(current_df) == 0) {
    return(data.frame(Survey = current_acronym, English = 0, Spanish = 0, Total = 0))
  }
  
  all_svry_flags <- current_df %>%
    mutate(Survey = case_when(!is.na(Connect_ID) ~ current_acronym,
                              TRUE ~ "NA"),
           Flag = case_when(language == 773342525 ~ "Spanish", 
                            TRUE ~ "English")) %>%
    tbl_cross(
      col =Flag,
      row = Survey,
      digits = c(0, 2),
      percent = "row",
      label = list(Flag = "Survey Flag",
                   Site = "Survey"),
      missing = "ifany",
      margin_text = "Total") %>%
    modify_header(stat_0 = "Total")
  
  df_all_svry_flags <- as.data.frame(all_svry_flags)
  colnames(df_all_svry_flags)[1] <- "Survey"
  df_all_svry_flags <- df_all_svry_flags[2,]
  
  # Ensure the data frame has consistent columns by adding missing ones with zeros
  expected_columns <- c("Survey", "English", "Spanish", "Total")
  missing_columns <- setdiff(expected_columns, names(df_all_svry_flags))
  
  if (length(missing_columns) > 0) {
    for (col in missing_columns) {
      df_all_svry_flags[[col]] <- 0
    }
  }
  
  df_all_svry_flags <- df_all_svry_flags[expected_columns]
  
  return(df_all_svry_flags)
}

# Initialize empty lists to store the results for each condition
all_flags_list_overall <- list()
all_flags_list_condition1 <- list()
all_flags_list_condition2 <- list()

# Loop through each survey data frame and acronym
for (i in seq_along(survey_dfs)) {
  # Get the current data frame and acronym
  current_df <- survey_dfs[[i]]
  current_acronym <- survey_acronyms[i]
  
  # Overall table
  df_overall <- create_table(current_df, current_acronym)
  all_flags_list_overall[[current_acronym]] <- df_overall
  
  # Spanish
  current_df_cond1 <- current_df %>% filter(d_255077064 == 773342525)
  df_condition1 <- create_table(current_df_cond1, current_acronym)
  all_flags_list_condition1[[current_acronym]] <- df_condition1
  
  # English
  current_df_cond2 <- current_df %>% filter(d_255077064 == 163149180 | is.na(d_255077064))
  df_condition2 <- create_table(current_df_cond2, current_acronym)
  all_flags_list_condition2[[current_acronym]] <- df_condition2
}


final_df_overall <- do.call(rbind, all_flags_list_overall)
final_df_condition1 <- do.call(rbind, all_flags_list_condition1)
```

```{r BL_start_stop_Lang, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, results='asis'}

start_stop_lang <- function(data, filter_column, filter_value, language_value, target_column) {
    data %>% 
        filter(!!sym(filter_column) == filter_value & Pref_lang == language_value) %>% 
        summarize('N' = n(),
                  Min = min(!!sym(target_column), na.rm = TRUE),
                  Q1 = quantile(!!sym(target_column), 0.25, na.rm = TRUE),
                  Median = median(!!sym(target_column), na.rm = TRUE),
                  Mean = mean(!!sym(target_column), na.rm = TRUE), 
                  SD = sd(!!sym(target_column), na.rm = TRUE),
                  Q3 = quantile(!!sym(target_column), 0.75, na.rm = TRUE),
                  'Perc.90' = quantile(!!sym(target_column), 0.90, na.rm = TRUE),
                  Max = max(!!sym(target_column), na.rm = TRUE))
}
```
